catalog_info.title: Embedded Teaching Practicum (for Graduate Teaching Assistants)
catalog_info.description: Course for TAs currently teaching in an approved BBS Core Course. The embedded teaching practicum provides practice-based training in facilitating a group discussion; professionalism in the classroom; curriculum design, course evaluation and assessment development; and preparation for teaching throughout and beyond time in graduate school. Teaching assistants are provided training and experience in the development of an early-career teaching philosophy.
